languages.text: Святой Когнаций оставил после себя много сокровищ, влекущих сильных мира сего. Вольный Торговец Инцендия Чорда владеет осколками бесценного комбитула, несущего отпечатки пальцев святого. Потребуются влиятельные союзники и целое воинство клерков и писарей, чтобы в бюрократической войне официально истребовать сию реликвию через Адептус Администратум. Однако прибытие ее в монастырь Ордена Молота будет великим триумфом для верующих.

traits.locale_text: Изнурительной бюрократической тяжбой через Администратум выцарапать у династии Чорда мощи великого святого и перевезти на мир.

languages.text: Saint Cognatius left behind many treasures that are now coveted by powerful men and women. Rogue Trader Incendia Chorda possesses the shards of a priceless combi-tool bearing the saint's fingerprints. Formally reclaiming the relic via the Adeptus Administratum will be a bureaucratic war requiring influential allies and nothing short of an army of clerks and scribes. But if it is passed into the safekeeping of monks in the Order of the Hammer, it will be a great triumph for the faithful.
languages.original_text: Святой Когнаций оставил после себя много сокровищ, влекущих сильных мира сего. Вольный Торговец Инцендия Чорда владеет осколками бесценного комбитула, несущего отпечатки пальцев святого. Потребуются влиятельные союзники и целое воинство клерков и писарей, чтобы в бюрократической войне официально истребовать сию реликвию через Адептус Администратум. Однако прибытие ее в монастырь Ордена Молота будет великим триумфом для верующих.

Rogue Trader Incendia Chorda possesses the shards of a priceless combi-tool bearing the saint's fingerprints. Formally reclaiming the relic via the Adeptus Administratum will be a bureaucratic war requiring influential allies and nothing short of an army of clerks and scribes. But if it is passed into the keeping of monks of the Order of the Hammer, it will be a great triumph for the faithful.

languages.text: San Cognatius dejó atrás numerosos tesoros que ahora son objetivo de hombres y mujeres poderosos. La Comerciante Independiente Incendia Chorda posee las esquirlas de una combiherramienta que tiene las huellas dactilares del santo. Recuperar la reliquia de forma legal mediante el Adeptus Administratum desatará una guerra burocrática para la que harán falta aliados influyentes y un ejército de funcionarios y escribas. Pero si llega a manos de la Orden del Martillo, será un gran triunfo de la fe.
languages.original_text: Saint Cognatius left behind many treasures that are now coveted by powerful men and women. Rogue Trader Incendia Chorda possesses the shards of a priceless combi-tool bearing the saint's fingerprints. Formally reclaiming the relic via the Adeptus Administratum will be a bureaucratic war requiring influential allies and nothing short of an army of clerks and scribes. But if it is passed into the safekeeping of monks in the Order of the Hammer, it will be a great triumph for the faithful.

traits.locale_text: San Cognatius dejó atrás numerosos tesoros que ahora son objetivo de hombres y mujeres poderosos. La Comerciante Independiente Incendia Chorda posee las esquirlas de una combiherramienta que tiene las huellas dactilares del santo. Recuperar la reliquia de forma legal mediante el Adeptus Administratum desatará una guerra burocrática para la que harán falta aliados influyentes y un ejército de funcionarios y escribas. Pero si llega a manos de la Orden del Martillo, será un gran triunfo de la fe.

languages.text: Saint Cognatius a laissé de nombreux trésors aujourd'hui convoités par des hommes et des femmes de pouvoir. La libre-marchande Incendia Chorda détient les fragments d'un outil combiné d'une valeur inestimable, porteur des empreintes digitales du saint en personne. La réquisition officielle de la relique par l'intervention de l'Adeptus Administratum annonce une véritable guerre bureaucratique qui nécessitera des alliés influents et toute une armée de clercs et de scribes. Cependant, si elle était confiée aux moines de l'Ordre du Marteau, ce serait un grand triomphe pour les fidèles.
languages.original_text: Saint Cognatius left behind many treasures that are now coveted by powerful men and women. Rogue Trader Incendia Chorda possesses the shards of a priceless combi-tool bearing the saint's fingerprints. Formally reclaiming the relic via the Adeptus Administratum will be a bureaucratic war requiring influential allies and nothing short of an army of clerks and scribes. But if it is passed into the safekeeping of monks in the Order of the Hammer, it will be a great triumph for the faithful.

La libre-marchande Incendia Chorda détient les fragments d'un outil combiné d'une valeur inestimable, porteur des empreintes digitales du saint en personne. languages.text: 圣科尼亚蒂乌斯留下的许多圣物，已成为众多豪门权贵争相竞逐的珍宝。行商浪人因森蒂娅·库尔达就持有一套价值连城的组合工具碎片，上面仍留有那位圣人的指印。若想通过帝国内政部正式取回这件圣物，无异于发动一场官僚战争，需要结交无数有权有势的盟友，还要集结一支由文职人员组成的军队。不过，如果能说服因森蒂娅将圣物交给重锤修会的僧侣保管，那将会是忠诚信徒的伟大胜利。
languages.original_text: Saint Cognatius left behind many treasures that are now coveted by powerful men and women. Rogue Trader Incendia Chorda possesses the shards of a priceless combi-tool bearing the saint's fingerprints. Formally reclaiming the relic via the Adeptus Administratum will be a bureaucratic war requiring influential allies and nothing short of an army of clerks and scribes. But if it is passed into the safekeeping of monks in the Order of the Hammer, it will be a great triumph for the faithful.

traits.locale_text: 圣科尼亚蒂乌斯留下的许多圣物，已成为众多豪门权贵争相竞逐的珍宝。行商浪人因森蒂娅·库尔达就持有一套价值连城的组合工具碎片，上面仍留有那位圣人的指印。若想通过帝国内政部正式取回这件圣物，无异于发动一场官僚战争，需要结交无数有权有势的盟友，还要集结一支由文职人员组成的军队。不过，如果能说服因森蒂娅将圣物交给圣锤修会的僧侣保管，那将会是忠诚信徒的伟大胜利。

languages.text: 聖コグナティウスは現在では権力者たちの垂涎の的となっている数多くの財宝を残した。ローグトレーダーのインセンディア・チョーダは、聖人の指紋が刻まれた貴重な複合ツールの破片を所有している。帝国行政局を通じて正式に聖遺物を取り戻すには、有力な同盟者と事務官や書記たちの軍隊を必要とする官僚の戦争を行わねばならない。しかし、もし聖遺物が鉄槌の修道会の修道士たちの手に渡れば、それは信者にとって大きな勝利となるだろう。
languages.original_text: Saint Cognatius left behind many treasures that are now coveted by powerful men and women. Rogue Trader Incendia Chorda possesses the shards of a priceless combi-tool bearing the saint's fingerprints. Formally reclaiming the relic via the Adeptus Administratum will be a bureaucratic war requiring influential allies and nothing short of an army of clerks and scribes. But if it is passed into the safekeeping of monks in the Order of the Hammer, it will be a great triumph for the faithful.

traits.locale_text: 聖コグナティウスは現在では権力者たちの垂涎の的となっている数多くの財宝を残した。ローグトレーダーのインセンディア・チョーダは、聖人の指紋が刻まれた貴重な複合ツールの破片を所有している。帝国行政局を通じて正式に聖遺物を取り戻すには、有力な同盟者と事務官や書記たちの軍隊を必要とする官僚の戦争を行わねばならない。しかし、もし聖遺物が鉄槌の修道会の修道士たちの手に渡れば、それは信者にとって大きな勝利となるだろう。

languages.text: St. Cognatius hat viele Schätze hinterlassen, nach denen nun mächtige Männer und Frauen gieren. Freihändlerin Incendia Chorda besitzt die Splitter eines unschätzbar wertvollen Kombi-Tools, auf dem sich die Fingerabdrücke des Heiligen befinden. Das Relikt formell über das Adeptus Administratum zurückzufordern, wird ein bürokratischer Krieg, der einflussreiche Verbündete und eine ganze Armee an Personal und Schreibern erfordert. Wenn das Relikt jedoch in die Obhut der Mönche des Ordens des Hammers übergeht, ist das ein großer Triumph für die Gläubigen.
languages.original_text: Saint Cognatius left behind many treasures that are now coveted by powerful men and women. Rogue Trader Incendia Chorda possesses the shards of a priceless combi-tool bearing the saint's fingerprints. But if it is passed into the safekeeping of monks in the Order of the Hammer, it will be a great triumph for the faithful.

languages.text: Aziz Cognatius, geride kudretli kimselerce arzulanan birçok hazine bıraktı. Azizin parmak izlerini taşıyan paha biçilemez bir kombi gerecin parçaları Hür Tacir İncendia Chorda'nın elinde. Yadigârı Adeptus Administratum'dan resmî yollarla talep etme gibi bir bürokratik savaşa girişilecek olursa nüfuzlu müttefikler ve tam anlamıyla bir kâtip ordusu gerekecektir. Fakat yadigâr, Çekiç Tarikatı'nın keşişlerine emanet edilirse inananlar için büyük bir zafer kazanılmış olur.
languages.original_text: Saint Cognatius left behind many treasures that are now coveted by powerful men and women. Rogue Trader Incendia Chorda possesses the shards of a priceless combi-tool bearing the saint's fingerprints. Formally reclaiming the relic via the Adeptus Administratum will be a bureaucratic war requiring influential allies and nothing short of an army of clerks and scribes.
